text: The Cape Verdean records in swimming are the fastest ever performances of swimmers from Cape Verde, which are recognised and ratified by the Federacao Cabo-verdiana de Natacao (FECAN). All records were set in finals unless noted otherwise. ==Long Course (50 m)== ===Men=== ===Women=== ==Short Course (25 m)== ===Men=== ===Women=== ==References== Cape Verde
title: List of Cape Verdean records in swimming
